data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reports Stabilize After Outage
data.Description: Google Search Console Performance reports are back to normal after experiencing a significant delay and displaying inaccurate data.  Google acknowledged the issue and assured users that the data was being reprocessed.

data.Title: Reddit Denies Blocking Google Search After Rumors
data.Description: Rumors circulated that Reddit was blocking Google Search from crawling and indexing its content. However, evidence suggests that Reddit may be serving different robots.txt information to Googlebot.

data.Title: Google Updates Image SEO Best Practices
data.Description: Google updated the "Use HTML image elements to embed images" section of its image SEO best practices.

data.Title: Google Explains Why Negative SEO is Ineffective
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes explains that negative SEO links don't work, confirming what link builders have known for years.

data.Title: Cloudflare Launches Tool to Combat AI Data Scraping
data.Description: Cloudflare has released a tool that aims to prevent bots from scraping websites for AI training data. The tool is available for free to all Cloudflare customers.

data.Title: OpenAI Updates ChatGPT App for macOS to Encrypt Local Conversations
data.Description: OpenAI has updated its ChatGPT app for macOS to encrypt locally stored conversations after a user discovered that chats were being stored in plain text.

data.Title: Google and the Department of Justice Face Off in Antitrust Trial
data.Description: The Department of Justice's antitrust trial against Google could have significant implications for the search giant's mobile search market share, potentially impacting its access to searches on iPhones.

data.Title: OpenAI Requests Source Materials from New York Times in Copyright Infringement Case
data.Description: OpenAI is requesting access to journalists' source materials from the New York Times as part of its defense against a multi-million dollar copyright infringement lawsuit.

data.Title: YouTube Enhances Copyright Protection for Creators with AI-Powered Tool
data.Description: YouTube has updated its "Erase Song" tool with an AI algorithm that can detect and remove copyrighted music from videos without affecting other audio tracks.
